snippet: With aid agencies expecting Syrian refugees to reach 1 million in 2013, the misery in one camp highlights the humanitarian crisis that threatens to further destabilize the Middle East.
abstract: Misery in one Syrian refugee camp in Jordan highlights humanitarian crisis that threatens to further destabilize Middle East; aid agencies expect number of Syrian refugees to reach one million in 2013, with more than half million who have already fled country in camps and villages across Jordan, Turkey and Lebanon, all of which have asked for more international aid.
